author: mrodozov
body: This is fixing the relvals failing in arm64 because of some characters malformation https://cms-sw.github.io/relvalLogDetail.html#slc7_aarch64_gcc700;CMSSW_10_1_X_2018-03-13-1100 also shortens the logic to skip unnecessary checks
title: Fix relval fails in RecoLocalTracker/SiPixelRecHits arm64 IB
